name: Fight Not With Monsters
description:
Stay alive as long as possible before getting turned into a tree!

Arrow keys or WASD to move, mouse to turn and left click to attack.

This is my Ludum Dare 35 submission, and my first ever Ludum Dare compo game! I ended up biting off more that I could chew, and had to make some compromises, but I'm just happy I finished it. I apologize for the sound effects in advance.

Can't wait to see all the great games everyone else made!
